vocabulary.definition: Facts, information, and skills acquired through experience or education; the theoretical or practical understanding of a subject.
vocabulary.french_definition: Faits, informations et compétences acquis par l'expérience ou l'éducation ; la compréhension théorique ou pratique d'un sujet.
vocabulary.korean_definition: 경험이나 교육을 통해 얻은 사실, 정보 및 기술; 주제에 대한 이론적 또는 실용적 이해.
vocabulary.example: His vast knowledge of history was impressive.

vocabulary.definition: The ability to do something that frightens one; bravery.
vocabulary.french_definition: La capacité de faire quelque chose qui effraie ; bravoure.
vocabulary.korean_definition: 두려움을 느끼는 일을 할 수 있는 능력; 용기.
vocabulary.example: It took a lot of courage to stand up and speak out.

vocabulary.definition: The emotions or conduct of friends; the state of being friends.
vocabulary.french_definition: Les émotions ou la conduite des amis ; l'état d'être amis.
vocabulary.korean_definition: 친구들의 감정이나 행동; 친구가 되는 상태.
vocabulary.example: Their friendship has lasted for over 20 years.
